name: Yixin Zhao, people call me Fiona

projects.title: This Portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio is a personal project that showcases my skills and projects. It is built using React and TypeScript, demonstrating my proficiency in modern 3D web development.

projects.title: Rock Pets Website
projects.description: Rock Pets is a playful web project designed as a creative exploration of web development and design. While not actively maintained for future updates, it showcases my skills in crafting engaging user experiences with a whimsical touch.

projects.name: AI-Powered Resume Analyzer

Assisted with client bookings, payments, and service recommendations.
Provided real-time translation during treatments to ensure customer satisfaction.
Enhanced the overall spa experience through clear and effective communication.
